rooms.description: Spacious entrance hall with natural light through a glass facade and ventilation openings.
Open-plan living area designed to maximize natural light via large windows and high ceilings. Vastu compliant position ensuring positive energy flow.
Dining area adjacent to living room with cross ventilation and ample daylight.
Functional kitchen area with south-eastern orientation (Vastu friendly) ensuring good light and airflow.
Master bedroom located in north-west direction to ensure calmness and privacy. Incorporates large windows for natural ventilation.
Additional bedroom designed with south-west orientation for balanced energy flow.
Second additional bedroom placed in the north-east direction for optimal natural light and airflow.
Attached bathroom with proper ventilation near master bedroom.
Quiet library space dedicated to reading and study, designed in a north direction with ample natural lighting.

openings.description: Main entrance door positioned on the south side to allow entry of fresh energy in accordance with Vastu principles.
Windows placed strategically to enhance natural ventilation and light in the library and bedrooms.
Ventilation openings designed for effective air circulation within the living room and kitchen areas.
